name: Finger Connection
description:
Ready for a finger connection? Start by placing your fingers on the PSP® screen. Each round you will have to maneuver your fingers around to different spots on the game board. The longer you can last, the higher the chance of you and your partner having a finger connection. Are you ready?

Two players required and playable using a single PSP® system.

Download Finger Connection today!



"PSP" is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item's use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all of these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
